sentences.english: She stuffed her clothes in and then tried to close the lid.
sentences.chinese: 她把衣服塞進去，想蓋上蓋兒。

sentences.english: When I open the cover of rice cooker, my mind is filled with expectation!
sentences.chinese: 開電飯鍋的蓋兒的時候我的心是期待是一杯。
我要給這個箱子蓋上蓋兒。

sentences.english: My father nailed the cover of the jar down so that the air wouldn't come in.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸把罐子的蓋兒釘住，這樣空氣就進不去了。

sentences.english: He screwed the lid on the jar.
sentences.chinese: 他旋掉了罈子上的蓋兒。

sentences.english: Fasten the lid on the jar.
sentences.chinese: 拿蓋兒把這個罐子蓋緊。

sentences.english: Lighter does not self extinguish close lid to put it out.
sentences.chinese: 打火機不會自己熄滅，要熄火蓋蓋兒。

sentences.english: Gabriella invited Jordan to enjoy New Year's Eve dinner together.
sentences.chinese: 加布裏蓋兒邀請喬丹一起喫年夜飯。

sentences.english: Where's the top of the jam jar?
sentences.chinese: 果醬罐子的蓋兒在哪兒？
他旋掉了罈子上的蓋兒。

sentences.english: He uncovered the dish and showed us the food.
sentences.chinese: 他揭開盤子的蓋兒給我們看喫的東西。

sentences.english: I cannot fit the lid on this box.
sentences.chinese: 我蓋不好這個箱子蓋兒。
